metadata.synopsis: If the shadow curse wasn't lifted, the party will remark that we still need protection against the curse despite Ketheric having been defeated.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use "oe SCE_SetupDebrief" or use the debugbook to go to act 2 region "Epilogue".- Enter the trigger S_SCE_PartyVB_ShadowCurseNotLifted_Trigger_501ae20e-9ef9-435e-8d13-860fa434d056 on the bridge from Moonrise to the town, at the Moonrise waypoint.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Ketheric may be gone, but the shadows remain. On our guard.
0.context: NodeContext: SH: 'the shadow curse remains' = SH has abandoned Shar. 'Lady Shar's power persists' = SH loyal to shar.
